# setCaption(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the text of the label on a push button control.

## Declaration

```swift
func setCaption(_ name: String!)
```

## Parameters

- **name**: The text to be used as the label on a push button control.

## Related Documentation

- **PDFAnnotationButtonWidget**: A `PDFAnnotationButtonWidget` object provides user interactivity on a page of a PDF document. There are three types of buttons available: push button, radio button, and checkbox.

## Getting and Setting the Control Label Text

- **caption()**: Returns the text of the label on a push button control.
